text:
Running Oracle applications, repeated message in error_log & error_log_pls:
'OPM:Fail to call fnctl with rlock'
in mod_jserv.log:
apj12: Servlet Error: ClassNotFoundException: discoservlet

running on solaris 5.8
Happens every time httpd is shutdown using adapcctl.sh  
httpd.pid, httpd_pls.pid, httpd, java & rotatelogs processes need maunually 
killing.
creator: jhymas@sunterra.com
rpluem@apache.org
text:
This is a version of httpd adjusted and modified by Oracle and with additional
modules provided by Oracle. Please contact the Oracle support on this issue or
have a look into Oracle's metalink.

(In reply to comment #1)
> This is a version of httpd adjusted and modified by Oracle and with 
additional
> modules provided by Oracle. Please contact the Oracle support on this issue 
or
> have a look into Oracle's metalink.

I'm not looking for a complete solution, just wanted to know what fnctl and 
OPM: are ?
(there is nothing on metalink)
Thanks
John
creator: jhymas@sunterra.com
